answers.answer: Hi!I am sorry to hear about your medical problems.  You may be more aware of the burning sensation at night as you are relatively free then. Other possibility is body lice.Generalized feeling of a burning sensation can also be due to dry skin, hyperthyroid states, liver or gall bladder dysfunction, peripheral neuropathies (as in diabetes, hypothyroidism, Lyme’s and lupus), pinched nerves, or decreased sweating as in Sjogren’s syndrome. In females above 40 years it can be a symptom of menopause or premenopause. Fibromyalgia is another possibility.Since a confirmed diagnosis cannot be given on net please consult your doctor regarding this. Hope this helps.
